name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-token-app-csharp
title: Meeting Token Generator
shortDescription: The Meeting Token Generator app for Microsoft Teams allows participants to request and manage interaction tokens, ensuring equitable participation during meetings like scrums and Q&A sessions.
longDescription: This sample app enhances Microsoft Teams meetings by allowing participants to request sequential tokens for interaction, promoting fair engagement. Built with the Live Share SDK, it updates data in real-time for all meeting attendees, making it ideal for collaborative settings.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing meeting token generator
